mapper.select: select f.board_idx as boardIdx, f.user_idx as userIdx, u.nickname as nickname, f.title as title, f.content as content, f.create_at as createAt, f.update_at as updateAt, f.likes as likes, f.stock as stock from feed f left outer join following l on f.user_idx = l.following_idx join user u on f.user_idx = u.user_idx where l.user_idx = #{userIdx} or f.user_idx = #{userIdx} order by f.create_at desc limit #{pageNum}, 10

select distinct f.board_idx as boardIdx, f.user_idx as userIdx, u.nickname, f.title, f.content, f.create_at as createAt, f.update_at as updateAt, f.likes, f.stock from feed f join user u on f.user_idx = u.user_idx left outer join feed_tag t on f.board_idx = t.board_idx where f.title like CONCAT('%', #{searchContent}, '%') or f.content like CONCAT('%', #{searchContent}, '%') or f.stock like CONCAT('%', #{searchContent}, '%') or t.content like CONCAT('%', #{searchContent}, '%') order by f.create_at desc limit #{pageNum}, 5
select count(*) from feed f left outer join following l on f.user_idx = l.following_idx where l.user_idx = #{userIdx} or f.user_idx = #{userIdx}

select ft.content as keyword, count(*) as amount from feed_tag as ft join feed as f on f.board_idx =ft.board_idx where f.create_at between date_add(now(), interval-1 week) and now() group by ft.content order by amount desc
